mapper.insert: insert into regist(seq_regist_no,regist_name,regist_price,regist_auction,regist_image,regist_real_image,regist_amount,regist_description,regist_date,seq_member_no, regist_kinds,regist_status, category_macro, category_micro) values(seq_regist_no.nextval, #{registName}, #{registPrice} , #{registAuction},#{registImage},#{registRealImage}, #{registAmount},#{registDescription}, SYSDATE,#{seqMemberNo},#{registKinds},#{registStatus},#{categoryMacro}, #{categoryMicro})

insert into order_ values ( seq_order_no.nextval, sysdate, #{orderPrice}, #{orderAmount}, #{orderMethod}, #{orderEtc}, #{orderTraceMethod}, #{orderResult}, #{orderPoint}, #{orderCoupon}, #{seqBasketNo}, #{seqMemberNo}, #{merchantUid}, #{impUid} )
mapper.update: update product set product_onsale = 'N', buyer_no=#{seqMemberNo} where seq_product_no = #{nProductNo}
update coupon_listt set coupon_status='Y' where seq_member_no =#{seqMemberNo} and seq_coupon_no = #{couponL}
